```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
data <- read.csv("~/Documents/2017-18/ECON241/Problem_Sets/ps1/pwt_excerpt.csv")
```

**(A)**

```{r}
data <- data %>% mutate(gdpPercap = rgdpna/emp, capPercap = rkna/emp)
mean(data$gdpPercap)
cor(data$gdpPercap, data$capPercap)
```


**(B)**

```{r}
data <- data %>% mutate(savingsRate = delta*capPercap/gdpPercap)
mean(data$savingsRate)
```

**(C)**

```{r}
data <- data %>% mutate(lnA = log(gdpPercap)-1/3*log(capPercap))
mean(data$lnA)
```

**(D)**

```{r}
countries <- data %>% filter(country %in% c("Republic of Korea", "United States"))
log(countries[1,9]/countries[2,9])
countries[1,11]-countries[2,11]
countries[1,10]/countries[2,10]
```
